definition: the gods love the common people (idiom)

sentences.english: In thoughts from the visions of the night, when deep sleep falleth on men
sentences.chinese: 在思念夜中，異象之間，世人沉睡的時候。

sentences.english: Thee love of royal celebrities has always been staged for the world to see.
sentences.chinese: 皇室名流們的愛情總是如戲劇般上演，受到世人矚目。

sentences.english: In later years, Salinger become famous for not wanting to be famous, refusing interviews.
sentences.chinese: 晚年的塞林格卻因爲拒絕採訪不願出名而爲世人所知。

sentences.english: Books are the ever-burning lamps of accumulated wisdom the world of eternal.
sentences.chinese: 書籍是積累世人智慧的不滅的明燈。

sentences.english: The world mocks at it, and sometimes puts one in the pillory of it.
sentences.chinese: 世人對它大加嘲笑，有時甚至因它把人送上斷頭臺。

sentences.english: The forest depths, by foot unpressed.
sentences.chinese: 林深處，未經世人腳印壓迫。

sentences.english: The other lost his life to win the whole world's faith.
sentences.chinese: 一位舍掉生命卻贏得世人的信靠。

sentences.english: His masterpiece, The Way of All Flesh did not get much attention when it was firstly published.
sentences.chinese: 該作品在問世之初並沒有引起世人太多的關注。

sentences.english: All flesh shall perish together, and man shall turn again unto dust.
sentences.chinese: 凡有血氣的就必一同死亡，世人必仍歸塵土。

sentences.english: It does not belong to a mere fallible human being to question the ways of divine providence.
sentences.chinese: 易犯錯誤的世人懷疑天佑之道是不適當的。

sentences.english: To declare that the incompleted leaves also have the right to dance in the branches.
sentences.chinese: 向世人宣告殘缺的樹葉也有在枝頭舞蹈的權利。

sentences.english: In general, Su Qin's unite means is called a variable means.
sentences.chinese: 一般地說，蘇秦“合縱術”被世人冠之以權變之術。

sentences.english: It was only later that the world recognized his greatness.
sentences.chinese: 支是到後來世人才承認他的偉大。

sentences.english: Both because of its inclination and its beauty, the Tower has been the object of very special attention.
sentences.chinese: 由於傾斜和獨特的美，比薩斜塔吸引了世人的眼光。

sentences.english: The unusually strong story is partially based on the true life of Wong Fei Hung.
sentences.chinese: 由於黃飛鴻的一生世人知之甚少，所以劇情多有虛構。

sentences.english: The hour when man must cease to be?
sentences.chinese: 世人向塵寰告別的時刻？

definition: for all eternity/throughout all ages/eternity (used in an elegiac couplet, wreath etc dedicated to the dead)
(of one's name, reputation etc) to be immortalized (idiom)/to leave a mark for generations to come
this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
to admire/to revere/to look up to
